DOC.brief_summary: Rationale : The effect positional distribution dietary fatty acid marker inflammation blood lipid metabolites diet contain fatty acid oleic acid associate reduce risk cardiovascular disease widely study . Hypothesis : There would difference detect concentration marker inflammation blood lipid metabolite human volunteer feed control diet . Study design : A randomized , double-blind , crossover clinical trial involve 41 healthy volunteer . The volunteer select base inclusion exclusion criterion . They consume control diet 5 week provide 15 % energy protein , 30 % energy fat , 55 % energy carbohydrate . Volunteers assign test diet cook novel olein , palm stearin partially hydrogenate soybean oil random order three diet consume person . Main study parameter : LDL-cholesterol
DOC.brief_title: Effect Oleic Acid Inflammation Markers Blood Lipid Metabolites : A Randomised , Double-Blind , Crossover Study
